title: bee-ORGANIC
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian and fish. Atmosphere feels like a private home, seats up to 20. Specialties include French crepes with fresh fruit, veggie burgers, organic soups, salads, juices, smoothies, selection of teas, plus a whole section of natural skin care products and eco-gifts. First of 2 locations.
